AI Description: GConf is a configuration database system used by GNOME desktop environment and other GNOME software applications to store settings and preferences. It provides a centralized location for storing configuration data, allowing applications to access and update settings easily.
Core Features: Centralized Configuration Database System, Used By Gnome Desktop Environment & Gnome Applications, Stores Settings & Preferences, Provides An Easy Way For Applications To Access & Update Configuration Data
General Tags: Configuration Management, Settings, Preferences, Desktop Environment
